docs.lead_paragraph: Speculation about the real reasons behind the unexpected resignation Sunday of Pfizer's chief executive and chairman, Jeffrey B. Kindler, is sure to fuel water-cooler conversations across the drug industry this week.

headline.main: The Week Ahead in Drug Industry News

docs.abstract: An F.D.A. panel reviews an experimental anti-obesity drug.
docs.snippet: An F.D.A. panel reviews an experimental anti-obesity drug.

docs.lead_paragraph: Overview | In this lesson, students consider how celebrities are using social media to build awareness about H.I.V. and AIDS. They then research the basic biology and epidemiology of H.I.V. and AIDS, and develop their own social media campaigns to educate people about the virus and to generate support for H.I.V. and AIDS advocacy.

headline.main: Raising Awareness: Developing Social Media Campaigns About H.I.V. and AIDS

docs.abstract: Lesson Plan | Researching the science and epidemiology of H.I.V. and AIDS and then using Twitter or Facebook to educate the public.
docs.snippet: Lesson Plan | Researching the science and epidemiology of H.I.V. and AIDS and then using Twitter or Facebook to educate the public.

byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO
